greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Determinant of an n X n matrix whose diagonal are the first n Primes of alternating sign and all other elements are 1's.
mathematica: Table[ Det[ DiagonalMatrix[ Table[ Prime[ i ]*(-1)^(i + 1) - 1, {i, 1, n} ] ] + 1 ], {n, 1, 20} ]
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 28 2002
